alert.note: Alert for Dunklin; Pemiscot (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 3:53AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Greene, eastern Clay, northwestern Pemiscot and eastern Dunklin Counties through 430 AM CST... At 352 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Saint Francis to near Marmaduke. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kennett, Piggott, Portageville, Hayti, Steele, Campbell, Rector, Senath, Clarkton, Holcomb, Hayti Heights, Wardell, St. Francis, Greenway, Bolton, Deering, Saint Francis, Bragg City, Pascola and Nimmons. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CST for eastern Arkansas...and southeastern Missouri.
